Text.Page: Upon arriving at Velika, <PCNAME> got fully prepared to start out as a new member of the Valkyon Federation.

oh, one last thing. Are you close to running out of space for items acquired on your travels?

Visit Getty in Freedom Plaza to expand your inventory. Your first expansion is free, and the rest are reasonably priced. But please make sure to save some money for your next pegasus flight!

==================================
You can expand your inventory.
==================================

Hey there! I offer an "Inventory Expansion" service for people just like you. First time's on the house!
If you're satisfied, you're welcome to come back and purchase my larger expansions!

==================================
You can expand your inventory.
==================================
